keyword_responses.housing: The housing office is open from 10 AM to 4 PM, You can contact them for information on dormitory availability and rental options.
keyword_responses.scholarship: Information about scholarships and financial aid can be found on the university's financial aid page, Application deadlines are also listed there.
keyword_responses.tution: Tuition fees are listed on the university's website, You can also find information on payment plans and due dates.
keyword_responses.events: Check the university calendar for upcoming events, seminars, and workshops happening on campus.
keyword_responses.sports: The sports complex is open from 6 AM to 10 PM, You can join various sports teams and fitness classes.
keyword_responses.food: The campus dining hall serves breakfast from 7 AM to 9 AM, lunch from 11 AM to 2 PM, and dinner from 5 PM to 8 PM
keyword_responses.transport: The campus shuttle service runs from 7 AM to 10 PM, providing transportation to various campus locations and nearby areas.
keyword_responses.courses: You can find information about course offerings and syllabi on the university's academic website,
keyword_responses.faculty: The faculty directory is available on the university's website, where you can find contact information for professors and staff.
keyword_responses.support: For academic and personal support, you can visit the student support center, open from 9 AM to 5 PM on weekdays.
keyword_responses.clubs: There are many student clubs and organizations on campus, You can join them by visiting the student activities office.
keyword_responses.registration: Course registration periods and procedures are detailed on the university's registration portal. Make sure to check the deadlines.
keyword_responses.internships: The career services office provides information on internships and job opportunities, You can visit them for guidance on applications.
keyword_responses.exam: The exam schedule and policies are available on the university's academic website, Be sure to check for any updates.
